name: Reading-list-widget
tagline: Reading List Widget Similar to The Daily Beast
body:
### Welcome to Reading List Widget
Lately we have seen quite a lot of websites that have Reading list widget to display the current reading position indicator, that how much you have "read", depending on how far have we scrolled down an article. Similar widgets you could observe in TheDailyBeast site http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2015/10/06/john-mccain-slams-obama-s-iran-deal-on-colbert-s-late-show-says-u-s-troops-should-fight-isis.html and Vulcanpost https://vulcanpost.com/398081/malay-girl-awesome-comeback-using-english-facebook/

### Example Screens
![Scrolling Progress Bar](https://photos-6.dropbox.com/t/2/AACmtzOwxjAp0JatVfToY5PxfAePlas9b7V-2SVH1KBihA/12/108989952/png/32x32/1/_/1/2/Screen%20Shot%202015-10-06%20at%205.39.24%20PM.png/EJLJpVQYlAcgBygH/3hE18ZQwNFEz-ejySVRemiC7CLLQIk2Wd_73qrG1_b8?size=1280x960&size_mode=2)

### Here is the Widget
https://github.com/mocento/reading-list-widget
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
